column5: U.S. CITIZEN AIR TRAFFIC2 TO OVERSEAS REGIONS, CANADA & MEXICO

column1: 1 Preliminary monthly data do not include 'late records' which will be reflected in Quarterly and Final Annual reports
2 Air traffic only, non-stop from US port to foreign port. Not same as total 'visitation' throughout the respective regions (refer 2008U.S. Outbound Profile)
3 Percentage change is compared to the same time frame from the previous year.
Note:  Air Traffic to Overseas and Mexico (on U.S. and foreign flags) are reported from the Office of Travel and Tourism Industries (OTTI) "U.S. International Air Travel Statistics Report" I-92.
Air traffic to Canada is obtained from Statistics Canada.
To find out more about the I-92 program, visit:
Source:  U.S. Department of Commerce, International Trade Administration, Office of Travel and Tourism Industries.
